item.title: 央行将使市场持续活跃至年底
item.description: 全球最大经济体的央行即将做出一系列难以预测的决定。十国集团的九家央行将在未来两周内讨论并决定货币政策。市场对其中许多决定的结果还没有完全下定决心。在今年年底，大多数央行的降息时间都比投资者预测的要长，这意味着市场将出现波动。【原文：A run of hard-to-predict central bank decisions in the world's biggest economies is coming up. Nine Group-of-10 central banks will debate and decide monetary policy in the next two weeks. Markets haven’t fully made up their mind on the outcome for many of them. That means volatility at the end of a year in which most central banks took longer to cut interest rates than investors had forecast.】

item.title: 南非顶级机场因燃料问题面临航班延误
item.description: 在南非最繁忙的机场，航空公司无法为飞机加油，在国有航空公司的飞行员结束罢工仅两天后，再次出现航班延误的可能性又增加了。【原文：Airlines at South Africa’s busiest airport are unable to refuel their aircraft, raising the possibility of renewed delays just two days after pilots at the state-owned carrier ended a strike.】

item.title: 盟友称西班牙总理桑切斯应寻求信任投票
item.description: 支持佩德罗-桑切斯当选首相的一个党派表示，西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯应寻求议会的信任投票。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez should seek a vote of confidence in parliament, according to one of the parties that supported his election as premier.】

item.description:
甚至在共和党人即将重返华盛顿之前，该国的养牛业就已经陷入了越来越深的困境。【原文：

Even before the Republican’s upcoming return to Washington, the country’s cattle industry has been in a deepening rut.

item.title: MapmyIndia 取消业务分拆计划后股价大涨
item.description: 一家名为 MapmyIndia 的 CE 信息系统有限公司的股票跳涨，因为该公司表示，它将撤销早些时候将消费者业务分拆出去的计划。【原文：Shares of an CE Info Systems Ltd., known as MapmyIndia, jumped after the company said it is reversing an earlier plan to carve out its consumer business.】

item.title: 佛罗伦萨附近的埃尼燃料库发生爆炸和火灾
item.description: 埃尼公司（Eni SpA）在一份声明中说，该公司在意大利佛罗伦萨附近拥有的一个燃料库周一发生爆炸和火灾。【原文：A fuel depot owned by Eni SpA near Florence, Italy suffered an explosion and fire on Monday, the company said in a statement.】

item.title: 花旗称现在是对欧洲央行快速降息下注的时候了
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）称，市场过度押注欧洲央行明年将迅速降息，交易员应将赌注押在欧洲央行明年将放慢降息步伐上。【原文：Traders should wager on a slower pace of interest-rate cuts by the European Central Bank next year, according to Citigroup Inc., which says the market has gone overboard in betting on swift reductions.】

item.title: 据说 Axiata 和 Sinar Mas 接近达成印尼分公司交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马来西亚无线运营商Axiata集团和印尼企业集团PT Sinar Mas集团即将达成协议，合并双方在东南亚最大经济体的电信业务。【原文：Malaysian wireless carrier Axiata Group Bhd. and Indonesian conglomerate PT Sinar Mas Group are nearing an agreement to merge their telecommunications operations in Southeast Asia’s largest economy, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 被制裁的俄罗斯油轮绕道英国折返
item.description: 一艘从波罗的海向印度运输俄罗斯原油的油轮在驶向设得兰群岛时突然转向，绕道英国北端。【原文：A tanker hauling Russian crude from the Baltic Sea to India that was observed heading toward the Shetland Islands — a route that would have taken it on a detour around the northern tip of the UK — made a sudden turn and instead took a more-typical journey through the English Channel.】

item.title: 葡萄牙萨门托表示坚信法国将解决危机
item.description: 葡萄牙财政部长若阿金-米兰达-萨门托（Joaquim Miranda Sarmento）表示，法国当前的政治危机并不会对整个欧洲构成威胁。【原文：France’s current political crisis isn’t a threat to Europe as a whole, Portuguese Finance Minister Joaquim Miranda Sarmento said.】

item.title: GIC 选择摩根大通为 50 亿美元的 Greenko 股权出售提供顾问服务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）正在与摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：GIC Pte is working with JPMorgan Chase & Co. to help advise on a strategic review of options including a sale of its 50% stake in India’s Greenko Energy Holdings, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be one of the biggest disposals in the country.】

item.title: 美国广播公司（ABC）报道使用未成年移民工人后，HelloFresh 下跌
item.description: 美国广播公司（ABC News）报道称，HelloFresh SE 正在接受美国劳工部的调查，原因是该公司的一家烹饪和包装工厂被指控使用移民青少年劳工，此后该公司股价创下自 8 月份以来的最大跌幅。【原文：HelloFresh SE shares fell the most since August after ABC News reported it is under investigation by the US Labor Department over allegations that one of its cooking and packaging facilities used migrant teen labor.】

item.title: 日本央行计划发表罕见的一月讲话，或将提升加息预期
item.description: 日本央行正在采取一个不同寻常的步骤，表明它正在努力改善沟通，此举可能会增加市场对下个月加息的预期。【原文：The Bank of Japan is taking an unusual step that signals its efforts to improve communications, in a move that may increase market expectations for a rate hike next month.】

item.title: 中国考虑在数周内将信达股权转移至主权财富基金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，作为监管改革的一部分，中国政府计划在未来几周内将中国最大的坏账管理公司之一的所有权转让给主权财富基金的一个部门。【原文：The Chinese government plans to transfer ownership in one of the nation’s biggest bad-debt managers to a unit of its sovereign wealth fund in coming weeks as part of a regulatory overhaul, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 奇货可居：Magnetar 如何为人工智能热潮融资（播客）
item.description: 今年，人工智能软件和支持该技术的硬件成为大受欢迎的投资项目。但这一领域仍存在一些限制因素，包括缺乏为如此众多的新创公司提供动力的计算设备。投资者不愿意为没有签订计算合同的公司提供资金，而计算供应商也不愿意为尚未获得资金的初创公司签订合同。今年早些时候，对冲基金 Magnetar 启动了它的第一支风险投资基金。【原文：AI software and the hardware that enables it have been hugely popular investments this year. But there have still been limiting factors on the sector, including a shortage of compute to power so many new start-ups. Investors don’t want to finance companies that lack a signed contract for compute, and compute providers don’t want to sign contracts for startups that haven’t already secured funding. Now Magnetar, a hedge fund that started its first ever venture capital fund earlier this year, is tr】

item.title: 国际空间站称，迈克-阿什利的 Frasers 缺乏对 Boohoo 的具体计划
item.description: 据一位有影响力的代理顾问称，Boohoo Group Plc 的投资者应投票反对 Frasers Group Plc 对这家快速时尚零售商董事会席位的争夺。【原文：Boohoo Group Plc investors should vote against a pitch for board seats at the fast-fashion retailer by Frasers Group Plc, according to an influential proxy adviser.】

item.title: 随着法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole）采取行动加强权益，BPM 银行股价上涨
item.description: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）增持意大利第三大银行 Banco BPM SpA 的股份，此举旨在维护其在意大利的利益，Banco BPM SpA 在米兰的交易中上涨。【原文：Banco BPM SpA rose in Milan trading after Credit Agricole SA raised its stake in Italy’s third-largest bank, a move aimed at defending its interests in the country.】

item.title: 土耳其建筑股票因叙利亚重建赌注而大涨
item.description: 在巴沙尔-阿萨德政权迅速垮台之后，土耳其建筑相关股票在水泥和钢铁制造商的带领下大涨，因为投资者押注这些公司将在邻国叙利亚的重建中发挥关键作用。【原文：Turkish construction-related stocks, led by cement and steelmakers, surged as investors bet the companies will play a key role in the reconstruction of neighboring Syria after the rapid collapse of Bashar al-Assad’s regime.】

item.title: 以色列称袭击了叙利亚的化学武器仓库
item.description: 以色列外交部长吉迪恩-萨阿尔（Gideon Sa'ar）在周一的一次情况通报中说，作为一项预防措施，以色列袭击了叙利亚的化学武器和导弹储存地。【原文：Israel struck chemical weapons and missile storage sites in Syria as a preventive measure, Foreign Minister Gideon Sa’ar said in a briefing on Monday.】

item.title: 对大型债券基金而言，再次购买法国债务为时尚早
item.description: 一些全球最大的投资机构表示，法国政局的不稳定性已使经济增长和公共账目的前景变得模糊不清，以至于他们很难建立一个有建设性的投资案例。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest investment houses say the political instability in France has muddied the picture for economic growth and public accounts to the point that they’re struggling to build a constructive investment case.】

item.title: 瑞士对瑞士信贷的调查迫在眉睫，瑞银资本将受到牵连
item.description: 瑞士即将公布一份具有里程碑意义的政治调查报告，调查瑞士信贷集团 2023 年倒闭的原因，这份报告可能会对危机进行责任划分，并为瑞银集团未来的监管定下基调。【原文：Switzerland is nearing publication of a landmark political inquiry into the causes of Credit Suisse’s 2023 downfall, a report which is likely to apportion blame for the crisis and set the tone for the future regulation of UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 温和多风天气带来喘息 欧洲天然气价格下滑
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格连续第五天下滑，原因是温和多风的天气有助于保护天然气库存，使其不会加速消耗。【原文：Natural gas prices in Europe slipped for a fifth day as mild and windy weather helps protect inventories from faster depletion.】

item.title: 中国股市和人民币因政治局承诺而出现尾盘反弹
item.description: 由于中国最高领导人誓言放松货币政策并表示将采取措施刺激消费，在香港上市的中国股票在交易的最后一小时出现反弹。【原文：Chinese stocks listed in Hong Kong rebounded in the final hour of trading as the nation’s top leaders vowed to ease monetary policy and said they’ll take steps to boost consumption.】

item.title: 中国在潜在演习中限制空域，台湾提高警惕
item.description: 台湾称中国限制了其东南沿海的领空，并派遣海军舰艇靠近分隔两地的海峡，这表明北京可能会在世界上最紧张的地缘政治热点之一举行军事演习。【原文：Taiwan said China restricted airspace off its southeastern coast and sent naval vessels near the strait separating them, a sign Beijing may hold military drills in one of the world’s most tense geopolitical hotspots.】

item.title: 中国自 2011 年以来首次放宽货币政策立场
item.description: 中国最高领导人约 14 年来首次转变了对货币政策的立场，决策者们正在为下个月唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫后的第二次贸易战做好准备。【原文：China’s top leaders shifted their stance on monetary policy for the first time in some 14 years, as policymakers gird themselves for a second trade war when Donald Trump returns to the White House next month.】

item.title: 银行家预计 2025 年欧洲首次公开募股市场将化险为夷
item.description: 银行家们认为，尽管存在贸易摩擦和政治动荡的威胁，欧洲的首次公开募股反弹将在2025年扩大，因为私募股权公司希望卸载投资组合并确保回报。【原文：Bankers see Europe’s IPO rebound broadening in 2025 despite the threat of trade frictions and political upheaval, as private equity firms look to unload portfolios and secure returns.】
